topics.body:
Talking about the dude that was shot in Missouri by cops:

There is one good thing that has come out of this, the cops are now patrolling the protests instead of cracking down on them.

This may change how police react to protests in general for the better.  What I mean by this is that the last couple of decades in the usa the reaction by police has been, "Protest without a permit?! EVERYONE DOWN ON THE GROUND!  Everyone is under arrest!  Use the teargas!  Shut everything down!" which in this case was drastically making things worse.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
When DA was still relevantly new but an established "art" site, my parents yelled at me for using it because they thought it was a porn art website (because of the name, I suppose?).

I guess they weren't entirely wrong.
topics.author: 5041b54f7f123b77af00a442

topics.body:
"@And Brother I Hurt People":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53ee293e636872052c210000#post_53ee293e636872052c210000
I always wondered why they called it "Deviant" Art.

Cuz it really does kind of sound like you're gonna be signing up for some porn site if you have _never_ heard of it before. 

Pretty funny really. But then again, Da is weeeeird.
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53ee29ec6368720fa6930200#post_53ee29ec6368720fa6930200

I guess because art is about expressing yourself, even if it means going a little wild.

And what better way to do that than to draw your edgy neon green Sonic OC using a base made by a seven year old, thereby making it a glorified coloring book.

The internet is an amazing place.

topics.body:
So I've had a shitty last couple of days:

Short version is my C++ class was massively stressing me out cause I was barely behind in the class and was staying up three days at a time reading the book then sleeping 5 hours then doing it again.  I heard a loud banging sound in my ears like someone trying to kool-aid man through the front door only to realize it was my heart.

Basically I may have almost had a heart attack or something in my sleep from stress.

I'm fine now; healthy and such just went "fuck it I'll retake the class in spring instead".

I'm just saying "fuck C++" and just not going to do finish the class cause it would have required me to stay up another day and a half without sleep which would probably have literally killed me.

I'm fine though.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
